reviews.title: it\'s wonderful
reviews.comment: has a great story and wonderful gameplay. no problems at all so by all means i love it
reviews.author: Angela Daoheuang

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: User friendly and easy to use interface. Very good and original back ground overall an excellent game. Keep up the goid work
reviews.author: Sharon M

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Highly addicting, with a great storyline, and great characters. Videogame-like graphics and easy to play. Com2us has produced yet another successful game. Definitely five stars. As for the issue I had with the ocean I just restarted the game, and I can easily regain my place with a couple more hours of gameplay! :)
reviews.author: Jeff Moon

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It is a great game...nice n love it..keep up the good work..2 thumbs up!!
reviews.author: Che Akrami

reviews.title: Queens Crown 2
reviews.comment: Excellent! Really excellent! Everyone try to download this. It\'s very very cool and awesome
reviews.author: Akazukin Kinezana

reviews.title: :D WOOH
reviews.comment: I love this game ive been playing for day. Great storyline also love the use of a female for main char. Its not common
reviews.author: Lea Edge

reviews.title: Wonderful game!
reviews.comment: I love the storyline,  the increasing difficulty, the mini-missions. Its a REAL game if you ask me. This is something I wont get tired of. No complaints here.
reviews.author: Christina Clarke

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Another great rpg from com2us. Playable with low-end androids. Keep it up. Btw, Cool bgm too. :)
reviews.author: randolph caranto

reviews.title: Engrossing
reviews.comment: Very original story, smooth controls, colorful visuals and interesting characters. Awesome game. :)
reviews.author: Cheryl Tan

reviews.title: Average(S5360)
reviews.comment: A very nice game! But I will 5 Star it if you fix it in Samsung Galaxy Y it always force closes and even deleted some of my apps. Please fix it ASAP.
reviews.author: Adrian Melegrito

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I really love this one! Its challenging and sometimes you\'ll have to figure some quests out. I love the story plot and the way it \'flows\'(: but some quests are definitely hard that I am stuck on it for a few days):
reviews.author: Payton Mills

reviews.title: Very funn!!
reviews.comment: Love queen\'s crown! The graphics and costumes are adorable
reviews.author: Vivian L

reviews.title: Super fun!
reviews.comment: I\'m really picky about RPG games, and I love this one! Challenging but not frustrating, just remember to save often in case you die :)
reviews.author: Mars McFarland

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Loved this rpg game... nice story and great graphic. Love ya!
reviews.author: Kezia Cornelia

reviews.title: Addicting and amazing :)
reviews.comment: Oh my god, I\'m loving this game sooooo much! The graphics are so pretty and the story is really interesting. I also love Chocolate Tycoon!  Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Katherine Batova

reviews.title: Too dependant on crafting
reviews.comment: In order to get better equipment you have to craft you cant even buy/farm it
reviews.author: Zachary Craner

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice game rpg from com2us. Like inotia but the system play like playing mana saga that improvement char with leveling weapon Like it
reviews.author: hanyoko lam

reviews.comment: Really splended game with a female main character. I\'m enjoying the story and hope they add more
reviews.author: Yucheng Dong

reviews.title: A Very Amusing Past Time
reviews.comment: Interesting gameplay with a moderate story.
reviews.author: Kanzaki Moe

reviews.title: Best a-rpg so far!!!
reviews.comment: Superb graphics, excellent story and entertaining gameplay. Of all the arpg\'s I\'ve seen this one takes the cake
reviews.author: Gilberto Abracia
